org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.em

Class HardEM

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.WeightLearningApplication
      • org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.VotedPerceptron
        • org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.em.ExpectationMaximization
          • org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.em.HardEM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelApplication

    public class HardEM
extends ExpectationMaximization
    EM algorithm which fits a point distribution to the single most probable assignment of truth values to the latent variables during the E-step.

    • Field Detail

      • CONFIG_PREFIX

        public static final String CONFIG_PREFIX
        Prefix of property keys used by this class.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ADAGRAD_KEY

        public static final String ADAGRAD_KEY
        Key for Boolean property that indicates whether to use AdaGrad subgradient scaling, the adaptive subgradient algorithm of John Duchi, Elad Hazan, Yoram Singer (JMLR 2010). If TRUE, will override other step scheduling options (but not scaling).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ADAGRAD_DEFAULT

        public static final boolean ADAGRAD_DEFAULT

    • Method Detail

      • computeScalingFactor

        protected double[] computeScalingFactor()
        Description copied from class: VotedPerceptron
        Computes the amount to scale gradient for each rule. Scales by the number of groundings of each rule unless the rule is not grounded in the training set, in which case scales by 1.0.
        Overrides:
        computeScalingFactor in class VotedPerceptron
